column5: Anyone know where i can purchase reasonably priced mercury outboard parts ? I need the following: a spark plug wire/coil for the 3rd cylinder and a oil latch cover for the cowling  As you can see the inside is rusted compared to the other 2, and this rust has transferred over to the spark plug, causing problems.  Motor is a 1999 mercury 75 hp 2 stroke oil injected Thanks !

Try , www.boats.net I have ordered from them for motorcycle parts as well . They have online parts manual for all makes , Mercury , Yamaha , Suzuki , Honda , Johnson , Nissan , Evinrude , OMC . Fast service too !

I've bought from Mercury  https://webapps.brunswick.com/literature/literatureSearch.do  You enter the serial number of your engine and you get detailed schematics so you know what parts you need for the job.  When I ordered it was seamless....and the parts arrived quickly.

Here's a list of the sites I have bookmarked on my 'puter.  http://www.marinemanifold.com/  http://www.marineparts.com/PARTSPAGES/mercurymariner.htm  http://www.usboatsupply.com/outboard-parts.php  http://www.maxrules.com/fixmercindex.html
Thanks Guys, i'll bookmark all those sites !
